name: Adolf's House
description: A private residence in Cassandra belonging to Adolf, a well-dressed social con man who trades in secrets. What begins as a tense conversation quickly turns violent when inhuman attackers strike the house.

snapshot.name: Attack at Adolf's House
snapshot.description: The investigators arrive at Adolf’s home for questioning. The house appears ordinary and respectable, reflecting Adolf’s carefully maintained image. During the conversation, windows suddenly shatter and robed figures descend from the roof and walls, revealing themselves as grotesque spider-human hybrids intent on killing everyone inside.

characters.name: Adolf
characters.notes: A con man who moves among the upper class and survives by selling sensitive information. He is evasive and untrustworthy, and may betray the investigators later.

characters.name: Cultist attackers
characters.location: Roof, walls, and inside the house
characters.notes: Humanoid creatures disguised in black robes, later revealed to have bloated bodies and spider-like legs.

clues.clueText: The attackers are not human; beneath their robes they possess spider-like legs and grotesquely altered bodies.
clues.location: During the attack inside the house
reveals: Inhuman forces are directly involved in events surrounding Adolf.

clues.clueText: If Adolf survives, he admits he is a fraud living off selling secrets and sensitive information about influential people in Cassandra.
clues.location: Conversation with Adolf after the attack
reveals: Adolf knows many hidden secrets about key figures in Cassandra.

clues.clueText: Adolf mentions the Redstone Lady and the hardware store as relevant to his information network.
reveals: Connections to the hardware store and the Redstone Lady.

conditions.description: Shattering glass, frantic movement, and violent struggle during the ambush.
Sudden outbreak of combat in a confined indoor space.

events: The attackers are revealed to be spider-human hybrids.
Adolf may be rescued and provide information.

exits.description: The main exit of the house, potentially blocked during the attack.
Broken windows created during the assault.

snapshot.keeperNotes: This scene is designed as a sudden escalation into combat. Even if rescued, Adolf should remain unreliable and capable of betraying the investigators later.
permanentChanges: Adolf’s house is damaged during the attack.
The investigators are directly exposed to inhuman enemies.

connections.description: Adolf provides information linking events to the hardware store owner.
Adolf references the Redstone Lady as part of the hidden power structure in Cassandra.
